title: Textile, 1931-4-79, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Piece of black silk embroidered in bands for the decoration of costume. Design of leaves, blossoms, and gourds in polychrome silks with couched gold threads outlining the gourds.
